channel.title: Special attack?
channel.description:
okay, so im trying to make the special bar show up on a weapon, i got it coded in, but its not showing up. This is the coding i have in combatassistant
Its located under this public boolean. [code]public boolean checkSpecAmount(int weapon) {[/code]
[code] case 4587: case 859: case 861: case 15701: // dark bow case 15702: // dark bow case 15703: // dark bow case 15704: // dark bow case 14010: <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< Custom weapon id. case 14011: <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< Custom weapon id. case 11235: case 11700: if(c.specAmount >= 5.5) { c.specAmount -= 5.5; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; } return false;[/code]
can someone please try to help me????????
